CdrDoc.CdrDocXml:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <!-- ================================================================ $Id$
Filter to create a Person Content QC Report Written by Volker Englisch
$Log: not supported by cvs2svn $ ================================================================ --> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl = "http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version = "1.0" xmlns:cdr = "cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr">
<xsl:output method = "html"/>
<xsl:include href = "cdr:name:Module: Attribute Sets"/> <xsl:include href = "cdr:name:Module: Person QC Common"/>
<xsl:param name = "location"/>
<xsl:variable name = "docID" select = "document('cdrutil:/docid')"/> <xsl:variable name = "whoAmI" select = "'PersonAtOrg'"/> <!-- =============================================================== Main Template Filter written by C.Burg - 4/26/2002 =============================================================== --> <xsl:template match = "/"> <xsl:apply-templates select = "Person"/> </xsl:template>
<!-- =================================================================== Generate the HTML for the Person at Org Report The resulting data will be included into the report as list items. =================================================================== --> <xsl:template match = "Person"> <xsl:apply-templates select = "PersonNameInformation"/> <xsl:apply-templates select = "PersonLocations"/> <xsl:apply-templates select = "DatedAction"/> <p/> </xsl:template> </xsl:transform>
